languages.text: Висирь Кровавой паутины Кибелла свершила великий расклад Таро Императора, и карта Владыки мечей указала ее культу новый путь и новое учение. Облачившись в золото и помазав лица кровью, ткачи вышли на верхние палубы и присвоили власть и почтение, что полагались им, избранным слугам Неумирающего. Окружив священн{mf|ого|ую} Домин барьером острых клинков, ткачи стали {mf|его|ее} гвардией и новой корабельной знатью. Гордые офицеры гнули жесткие шеи перед ними, простолюдины наполняли их кубки своей кровью. Кровавая паутина протянули нити на все миры династии, избирая новобранцев среди отмеченных сильной и благородной кровью. Расклад Висиря сулил мрачные перемены, и Кровавая паутина готовилась встретить их многочисленной и вооруженной.

Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. The spinners vested themselves in gold, painted their faces with blood, came to the upper decks, and took the power and respect they were owed as the Undying One's chosen servants. The spinners surrounded the Domin with a barrier of sharp blades, becoming {mf|his|her} guard of honour and the ship's new gentry. Proud officers bent their stiff necks before them. Commoners filled their cups with their blood. The Bloodspun Web extended a thread to each of the dynasty's worlds, picking new recruits among those bearing marks of strong and noble blood. The Vizsier's reading portended grim changes, and the Bloodspun Web was making sure it would have the numbers and the weapons to face what was to come.
languages.original_text: Висирь Кровавой паутины Кибелла свершила великий расклад Таро Императора, и карта Владыки мечей указала ее культу новый путь и новое учение. traits.locale_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web made a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Swordmaster, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. The Spinners vested themselves in gold, painted their faces with blood, came to the upper decks, and took the power and respect they were owed as the Undying One's chosen servants. The spinners surrounded the Domin with a barrier of sharp blades, becoming {mf|his|her} guard of honour and the ship's new gentry. Proud officers bent their stiff necks before them. Commoners filled their cups with their blood. The Bloodspun Web extended a thread to each of the dynasty's worlds, picking new recruits among those bearing marks of strong and noble blood. The Vizsier's reading portended grim changes, and the Bloodspun Web was making sure it would have the numbers and the weapons to face those changes.

languages.text: Vizsier Kibellah vom Blutgesponnenen Netz las das Tarot des Imperators und eine Karte, der Herr der Schwerter, offenbarte dem Kult einen neuen Weg und eine neue Lehre. Die Spinner kleideten sich in Gold, bemalten ihre Gesichter mit Blut, kamen auf die oberen Decks und nahmen sich die Macht und den Respekt, der ihnen als auserwählte Diener des Todlosen gebührte. Die Spinner umringten {mf|den|die} Domin mit einer Barriere aus scharfen Klingen und wurden so zu {mf|seiner|ihrer} Ehrenwache und zur neuen Oberschicht des Schiffes. Stolze Offiziere neigten ihre steifen Hälse vor ihnen. Das gemeine Volk füllte seine Tassen mit ihrem Blut. Das Blutgesponnene Netz sponn einen Faden zu allen Welten der Dynastie und wählte Rekruten, die stark und von edlem Blut zu sein schienen. Die Lesung des Vizsiers prophezeite dunkle Veränderungen und das Blutgesponnene Netz sorgte dafür, dass es über die nötigen Kämpfer und Waffen verfügte, um sich der unbekannten Gefahr zu stellen.

languages.text: La vizir Kibellah de la Toile de Sang se livra à un grand rituel divinatoire avec le tarot de l'Empereur, à l'issue duquel l'arcane du Seigneur des Épées révéla à son culte une nouvelle voie pavée d'enseignements révolutionnaires. Les tisseurs se parèrent d'or et peignirent leurs visages avec du sang avant de gagner les ponts supérieurs pour s'emparer par la force du pouvoir et du respect qui leur étaient dus en leur qualité de serviteurs élus de l'Immortel. Ils entourèrent {mf|le|la} Domin d'une haie de lames acérées et devinrent sa garde d'honneur, remplaçant ainsi l'ancienne élite du vaisseau. Les fiers officiers courbèrent l'échine devant eux et la populace emplit leurs coupes de son sang. La Toile de Sang tendit ses filets dans tous les mondes de la dynastie, choisissant de nouvelles recrues parmi les habitants portant la marque d'un sang noble et puissant. Les prédictions de la vizir annonçaient de funestes changements, et la Toile de Sang s'assurait ainsi d'avoir les effectifs et les armes nécessaires pour braver les aléas de l'avenir.
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. languages.text: La Visir Kibellah de la Red Sanguinolenta hizo una gran lectura del Tarot del Emperador. Una carta, el Señor de Espadas, mostró un nuevo camino para su culto y una nueva enseñanza. Los tejedores se vistieron de oro, pintaron sus caras con sangre, acudieron a las cubiertas superiores y ocuparon el poder y el respeto que merecían como sirvientes elegidos del Inmortal. Los tejedores formaron una barrera de hojas afiladas en torno a su Domin, convirtiéndose en su guardia de honor y en la nueva nobleza de la nave. Los orgullosos oficiales se inclinaban ante ellos. Los plebeyos llenaban sus copas con su propia sangre. La Red Sanguinolenta hiló sus hebras por todos los mundos de la dinastía, buscando reclutas entre la gente con sangre fuerte y noble. La lectura de la Visir presagiaba cambios siniestros, y la Red Sanguinolenta tomó las medidas necesarias para tener armas y gente suficiente como para enfrentarse a lo que se avecinaba.
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. The spinners vested themselves in gold, painted their faces with blood, came to the upper decks, and took the power and respect they were owed as the Undying One's chosen servants. languages.text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジール・キベラは、皇帝陛下の占い札を見事に読み解き、「剣の主」のカードによって、教団の新たな道と教えを得た。スピナーは黄金に身を包み、血で化粧をすると上層デッキへとやって来て、不死の者に選ばれた従者として、権力と尊敬を手に入れたのだ。スピナーたちは鋭利な刃物の障壁でドミンを取り囲み、{mf|彼|彼女}の儀仗兵となり、船の新たな貴族となった。誇り高き士官たちは、彼らの前で固まりきっていた首を垂れた。平民は自らの血で杯を満たした。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは王朝の各惑星へと糸を伸ばし、強く、高貴な血を引く者たちの中から新たな仲間を選び出した。ヴィジールの予知は厳しい変化を予感させるものだったため、ブラッドスパン・ウェブは来るべき事態に立ち向かうべく、人員と武器を確保していたのだ。
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. The spinners vested themselves in gold, painted their faces with blood, came to the upper decks, and took the power and respect they were owed as the Undying One's chosen servants. The spinners surrounded the Domin with a barrier of sharp blades, becoming {mf|his|her} guard of honour and the ship's new gentry. Proud officers bent their stiff necks before them. Commoners filled their cups with their blood. The Bloodspun Web extended a thread to each of the dynasty's worlds, picking new recruits among those bearing marks of strong and noble blood. The Vizsier's reading portended grim changes, and the Bloodspun Web was making sure it would have the numbers and the weapons to face what was to come.

traits.locale_text: ブラッドスパン・ウェブのヴィジール・キベラは、皇帝陛下の占い札を見事に読み解き、「剣の主」のカードによって、教団の新たな道と教えを得た。スピナーは黄金に身を包み、血で化粧をすると上層デッキへとやって来て、不死の者に選ばれた従者として、権力と尊敬を手に入れたのだ。スピナーたちは鋭利な刃物の障壁でドミンを取り囲み、{mf|彼|彼女}の儀仗兵となり、船の新たな貴族となった。誇り高き士官たちは、彼らの前で固まりきっていた首を垂れた。平民は自らの血で杯を満たした。ブラッドスパン・ウェブは王朝の各惑星へと糸を伸ばし、強く、高貴な血を引く者たちの中から新たな仲間を選び出した。ヴィジールの予知は厳しい変化を予感させるものだったため、ブラッドスパン・ウェブは来るべき事態に立ち向かうべく、人員と武器を確保していたのだ。

languages.text: 织血罗网的宿老绮贝菈对帝皇的塔罗牌进行了一次伟大的解读，而“利刃之主”这张牌为她的教派指出了新的道路与教义。所有织网者身披黄金，脸上涂满鲜血，来到了上层甲板。身为不死之神的仆人，他们得到了理应获得的权力与尊重。织网者用锋利的刀刃，在秘者身边组成了一座刀墙，成为了{mf|他|她}的仪仗队与船上的新兴贵族阶层。高傲的军官在织网者面前低下了僵硬的头颅，而平民则用自己的鲜血装满圣杯。织血罗网的丝线延伸到了王朝的诸多世界，从那些拥有强大、高贵血统的人群之中甄选新的成员。宿老绮贝菈的预言昭示了即将到来的严峻变化，而织血罗网必须不断扩张，确保他们有足够的成员与武器面对即将到来的一切。
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching. The spinners vested themselves in gold, painted their faces with blood, came to the upper decks, and took the power and respect they were owed as the Undying One's chosen servants. The spinners surrounded the Domin with a barrier of sharp blades, becoming {mf|his|her} guard of honour and the ship's new gentry. Proud officers bent their stiff necks before them. The Vizsier's reading portended grim changes, and the Bloodspun Web was making sure it would have the numbers and the weapons to face what was to come.

languages.text: Kanipi Ağı Veziri Kibellah, İmparator'un Tarotu'ndan muazzam bir okuma gerçekleştirdi. Kılıçların Efendisi kartı, tarikatına yeni bir yol ve yeni bir öğreti gösterdi. Dokurlar, altın rengine bürünüp yüzlerini kanla boyadılar. Üst güvertelere gelerek Ölmeyen'in seçilmiş hizmetkârları olarak hak ettikleri gücü ve hürmeti ele geçirdiler. Dokurlar, Domin'i keskin kılıçlardan oluşan bir bariyerle kuşatarak onun şeref kıtası ve geminin yeni üst tabakası oldular. Gururlu subaylar, huzurlarında kaskatı kesilmiş boyunlarını eğdiler. Sıradan yurttaşlar, kupalarını kendi kanlarıyla doldurdular. Kanipi Ağı, hanedanlık dünyalardan her birine bir iplik uzatarak kuvvet ve soyluluk emaresi taşıyanlar arasından yeni mensuplar seçti. Vezir'in okumaları, merhametsiz değişimlerin habercisi oldu. Kanipi Ağı, gelecek tehlikelerle yüzleşecek sayıya ve silaha erişmek işin uğraştı.
languages.original_text: Vizsier Kibellah of the Bloodspun Web performed a great reading of the Emperor's Tarot, and a card, the Lord of Swords, showed her cult a new path and a new teaching.
